definition: an outline especially of a curving or irregular figure : shape, the line representing this outline
examples: the sleek contours of the car
The map shows the contour of the coastline.

definition: the general form or structure of something : characteristic
examples: … the contours of political and social theories.

definition: a usually meaningful change in intonation in speech
following contour lines or forming furrows or ridges along them
made to fit the contour of something
to shape so as to fit contours
to construct (something, such as a road) in conformity to a contour
